calculateAppAverageTime(HashMap<String, Long>, Date, Date) - Static method in class Servlets.ProcessAppCategory
For each APP category, process average daily APP usage time Based on start date and end date, calculate the number of days Loop through different APP categories, total usage time / number of days, get the average usage time
calculateAppPercentage(LinkedHashMap<String, Double>) - Static method in class Servlets.ProcessAppCategory
For each APP category, process average daily usage percentage of the total (average duration per category / the sum of the average duration across all categories)
calculateAverageGameTime(HashMap<Date, ArrayList<String>>, HashMap<Date, ArrayList<String>>, String, String) - Static method in class Servlets.ProcessSmartphoneOveruse
Returns the smartphone average daily gaming duration taken by the user
calculateAverageHourlyUsage(HashMap<String, ArrayList<String>>, String, String) - Static method in class Servlets.ProcessSmartphoneOveruse
Returns the smartphone access frequency of the user
calculateAverageTime(HashMap<String, UserAppUsage>, Date, Date) - Static method in class Servlets.ProcessBasicAppUsage
Retrieves the breakdown of users by their usage pattern.
calculateAverageUsageTime(HashMap<Date, ArrayList<String>>, String, String) - Static method in class Servlets.ProcessSmartphoneOveruse
Returns the smartphone average daily usage duration taken by the user
calculatePercentage(int, int) - Static method in class Servlets.ProcessBasicAppUsage
Represents the breakdown value as a percentage of the of the total users in the query period.

combineAllUsersAppCategory(HashMap<String, UserAppUsage>) - Static method in class Servlets.ProcessAppCategory
Combine all target users" APP usage time Create 11 (different APP categories) HashMap, key is APP category name, value is its total usage time Loop through all target users and put their usage time in corresponding APP category
